analyzed: evam eva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāra a vijñānam
iha śāriputra sarva dharmāḥ śūnyatā lakṣaṇā

original: anutpannā aniruddhā amalā avimalā anūnā aparipūrṇāḥ.
analyzed: an utpannāḥ a niruddhāḥ amalāḥ a vimalāḥ an ūnāḥ a paripūrṇāḥ

original: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānaṃ,
analyzed: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānam
na cakṣuḥ śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manāṃsi
na rūpa śabda gandha rasa spraṣṭavya dharmāḥ
na cakṣuḥ dhātuḥ yāvat na manaḥ vijñāna dhātuḥ
na avidyā na avidyā kṣayaḥ yāvat na jarā maraṇam
na jarā maraṇa kṣayaḥ na duḥkha samudaya nirodha mārgā
na jñānam na prāptiḥ na aprāptiḥ
tasmāt śāriputra a prāpti tvāt bodhisattvaḥ
prajñāpāramitām āśritya viharati a citta āvaraṇaḥ
sama sama mantraḥ sarva duḥkha praśamanaḥ satyam a mithyatvāt

original: Oṃ gate gate pāragate pārasaṃgate bodhi svāhā.
analyzed: om gate gate pāra gate pāra saṃgate bodhi svāhā
